title: Boushoku no Shoujo wa Ue wo Matashitai ~ Shiitagareta Shoujo wa Tensei shi Seimei wo Kurau ~ - Novel Updates
tags: Child Abuse   Depictions of Cruelty   Dragons   Female Protagonist   Immortals   Magic   Monsters   Seven Deadly Sins   Transported to Another World
author: Amato Kurosu   天兎クロス
description:
There was a girl who was abused and locked up inside by her parents, eventually she died of starvation.

When she opened her eyes she had reincarnated in a forest. With her emaciated body now gone, she swore to never let anything tie her down again, and that she would live happily and freely from now on.

However, hunger and other hardships will continue on to obstruct her new life.

With a cursed power called 【Gluttony】, today again, she keeps on going in order to sate her hunger.>
